attributes.action: Pause vaccine rollout in the UK for healthy, low risk people.
attributes.additional_details:
This inequitable distribution is not just a moral issues, it's also a mistake economically & epidemiologically. More transmission worldwide means more variants, with an increased risk of variants being resistant to vaccines. People will keep dying, travel & trade will not recover.  

We need to pause rollout except for those in the top 9 groups identified by the Joint Committee on Vaccination & Immunisation (JCVI) until global supply increases & the pandemic is under control globally.
attributes.background: Vaccines are our biggest hope for overcoming the Covid-19 pandemic but vaccinating the younger, healthy section of the population now is stopping other countries ability to vaccinate their most at risk.  Supply is limited & vaccinating all those most at risk worldwide should be the priority.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the two petitions we currently have open on the same topic:

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802

Donate surplus Covid-19 vaccine doses to poorer countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565462
